features: Without Side Effects: Clinically shown to increase iron levels without side effects, based on an 8 week clinical study of MegaFood Blood Builder Liquid Iron supplement, at 10 mL per daily dose
Gentle Liquid Iron: Contains 27 mg of iron per 10 mL serving of high potency fermented iron produced with beetroot juice; Supports energy levels, is non-constipating, and is gentle on the stomach

Great For The Whole Family: Our liquid iron can be taken by kids 4+, women, men, and pregnant or lactating women. Our Orchard fruit-flavored liquid iron supplement is made with fruit and vegetable juices and added nutrients
Convenient Liquid Format: Only one serving per day; Shake well before use; Adults take 2 teaspoons (10 mL) daily; Suitable for vegetarian diets
Obsessed With Quality: Vegetarian; Tested for over 125 Chemical substances; Made without 9 allergens: milk, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, soy, wheat, fish, shellfish, and sesame; Gluten-Free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been taking blood builder supplements for 5 years now and its been live changing. I decided to buy the liquid version for my children who were showing signs of low iron, constant fatigue and cravings for certain foods. My daughter has taken this for a month and she shows improvement in energy so we hope to continue using this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: Its what saved my life. My iron was a 5 and I can't make it to doctor appt but this has been keeping me alert and full of energy. Works better if consistent atleast a week. No worries my iv iron scheduled for the new year.Please dont rely on this to fix your iron if low like mine. Just good to keep u stable till u see doc. If your iron not low then its perfect for regular use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Huge price increase?
reviews.reviewText: I buy every so often. Most recently buying this past summer. I have a receipt for $24 the big bottle — now it’s over $50? While I like the product and it works well, I’m curious, is this a temporary increase or a price change in the new year? Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would have been a regular customer had they not gotten ridiculous and doubled the price.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a liquid iron that would not constipate my 85+ yr old mother. I found this and was excited for her to try it. She did and liked the flavor. However, when my subscription was sent the price went up $10 and it wasn't even 6 months after the original purchase. Today I looked at it again to see if the price was reduced and now it's double what I originally paid for it. So, I will continue to seek an AFFORDABLE liquid iron for her to take to help build her blood.

reviews.reviewerName: This is the 3rd one we purchase. It is a great product. Thea
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the greatest blood and iron medicine
reviews.reviewText: I don’t feel weak anymore. This is the greatest iron supplement. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Price change on size?
reviews.reviewText: I have not bought this product in over a year. However, I do recall the bigger bottle costing over 20 bucks. I honestly thought that's what I was getting. It's actually the smaller bottle. I will go to A vitamin store for my next purchase. Hopefully, they still have the larger bottle for that price. Having said that, the product is great and tastes pretty good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Iron Supplement
reviews.reviewText: This stuff really works and it works fast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No no no yo the taste and feeling right after
reviews.reviewText: This makes me sick to my stomach, the feeling of having iron pills on an empty stomach. Really badI am going back to the pills ,they worked wonderfully not sure why I tried this . Maybe your experience will be different but No for me .i have the start because i couldn’t post a review without
